The User Interface Architecture

Lesson
objectives

Describe the user interface architecture for
Guidewire applications

Describe the kinds of PCF files

Open and edit PCF files

Deploy PCF files

| Guidewire application UI framework

PCF Element
HF
| Widget _ Location |

Displayable elements of the user Navigable places in the application that
interface rendered into HTML a user or the application itself can
navigate to

* The PCF (Page Configuration Format) object model is a proprietary application
framework used to create all Guidewire end-user interfaces

¢ By using the Studio Page Configuration (PCF) editor, you can modify an existing
PCF file or add a new PCF file and graphically build and manage its elements

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

Question

_— — Define the broad purpose for each element category:

¢
o A) Atomic widgets

B) Container widgets

C) Locations

Sooo ODDODSDoDoOoOoDOoOoOoOSD

Answer a

_— — Define the broad purpose for each element category:

¢
oY” A) Atomic widgets

B) Container widgets

C) Locations

The correct responses are:
A) Atomic widgets display individual elements of data and/or functionality.
B) Container widgets group atomic widgets into logical groups.

C) Locations define how users move from one place in the application to the next.

SOOO ODDDSDoOODDODOoOoS

Question

_— — What does a PCF file define?

¢
¢
¢

Sooo ODDODSDoDoOoOoDOoOoOoOSD

Answer

_— — What does a PCF file define?

¢
oY” APCF file defines a container widget or location and its contents.

SOOO ODDDSDoOODDODOoOoS

Question

_- — What does each PCF editor convention mean?

¢
o A) Acontainer widget shaded light blue

B) Alight green line
C) Ared background

Sooo ODDODSDoDoOoOoDOoOoOoOSD

Answer a

_— — What does each PCF editor convention mean?

¢
oY” A) Acontainer widget shaded light blue

B) Alight green line
C) Ared background

The correct responses are:

A) The container widget is referenced by the current PCF file and Its contents are
contained in another file

B) For the currently selected widget tool, a new widget of that type will be placed in
the current location.

C) The PCF file has an error in it.

SOOO ODDDSDoOODDODOoOoS

Question

_- — Howdo you deploy PCF changes?

¢
¢
¢

Sooo ODDODSDoDoOoOoDOoOoOoOSD

Answer a

_- — Howdo you deploy PCF changes?
¢
oY” You can restart the server. Restarting the server reloads PCF files at startup. A more
efficient approach for development is to Reload the PCF files. With internal tools
enabled, you can use the ALT+SHIFT+L keystroke to reload the PCF files. You can
also log in with an administrator user account and reload PCF files from the Internal
Tools Reload page.

SOOO ODDDSDoOODDODOoOoS

Lesson
objectives
review

Describe the user interface architecture for
Guidewire applications

Describe the kinds of PCF files

Open and edit PCF files

Deploy PCF files

| Student exercise
